p: Sigma Aldrich Chemicals Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA) has provided methanol, gum acacia, and charcoal, and tween-80 was from BDH Chemicals Ltd. (Poole, UK). Loperamide, amoxicillin, and flucoxacillin have been purshued from the Sanofi Bangladesh Ltd. (Dhaka, Bangladesh). Furthermore, all other chemicals used in this analysis were analytical grade.
